projects.title: Chakra Art Gallery
projects.subtitle: Operation: NFT Collection Showcase
projects.description: Designed a Web3-inspired gallery for NFT display using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features aesthetic UI, hover animations, and responsive grid layout for immersive digital art experience.

projects.title: Chakra Finance Manager
projects.subtitle: Mission: Resource Tracking System
projects.description: Built a responsive expense tracker using React & Context API with real-time transaction updates, form validation, and interactive charts for comprehensive financial management.

projects.title: Shinobi World Map
projects.subtitle: Mission: Mapping the Hidden Villages
projects.description: Crafted a minimal UI to explore places with Tailwind CSS and component-based design. Features responsive layout and modular architecture, future-ready for API integrations.

projects.title: Jutsu Code Editor
projects.subtitle: Advanced Development Environment
projects.description: Built a powerful online code editor with syntax highlighting, live preview, and multi-language support. Features real-time collaboration and integrated terminal.

projects.title: Chakra Chat Application
projects.subtitle: Real-time Communication Platform
projects.description: Developed a real-time chat application with user authentication, message encryption, and file sharing capabilities. Built with modern web technologies.

projects.title: Ninja Task Manager
projects.subtitle: Mission Planning & Tracking
projects.description: Created a comprehensive task management system with drag-and-drop functionality, priority levels, and team collaboration features.

projects.title: Weather Prediction Jutsu
projects.subtitle: Meteorological Intelligence System
projects.description: Built a weather forecasting application with location-based predictions, interactive maps, and detailed weather analytics using external APIs.

projects.title: E-commerce Marketplace
projects.subtitle: Digital Trading Platform
projects.description: Developed a full-stack e-commerce platform with user authentication, payment integration, inventory management, and admin dashboard.
